page.title: 05CHILDHOOD IN RADSTOCK
page.content: sandwiches for dinner,but I could have school dinners if I wanted.After dinner,1:00pm,I do project,which is when I am given a subject and have to find information on it.Last break, 2:00pm-2:10pm,we then continue with any work we have to finish.For the last 10 minutes my teacher reads us a story,this is until hometime which is at 3:05pm.I sometimes stay to tidy the library but usually walk straight home. When I get home I help my sister get dinner for when my Mum and Dad get home,at 6:30pm.We usually have cooked dinner with meat,potatoes,cabbage,peas or carrots and gravy.After dinner we all sit down and watch television,my sister and I go to bed at 9:30pm.I usually read for 10 minutes and then go to sleep.
